title: jakub.artur
author: jakub.artur
created_time: September 02, 2023, 08:20:44 AMLast edit: September 16, 2023, 04:50:44 AM by jakub.artur
content: **REDEV2 - Rede Project Continuation Announcement**Coin Name = RedecoinTicker = REDEV2Dear Rede community,We are excited to announce the continuation of the Rede project, now known as REDE, with significant changes and improvements. In this new phase, we introduce various updates to enhance the overall experience for our community members.**Key Changes:**1. **Reward Structure:** We have adjusted the reward system to offer greater incentives. The block reward is now 0.5 REDEV2 coins, and the staking reward is also set at 0.5 REDEV2 coins. https://stake.redecoin.eu2. **Gaming Rewards:** We are introducing gaming rewards, with 0.5 REDEV2 coins . (aktual testing only dev)**Blockchain Information:**REDEV2 is mined using the Ethash algorithm, ensuring a secure and efficient mining process. Blocks are generated every 15 seconds, providing a dynamic and fast-paced network. There is no maximum limit on the total supply of REDEV2 coins, offering ample opportunities for miners and stakeholders.**Metamask Setup:**To participate in the REDEV2 network, please configure your Metamask wallet with the following parameters:- Network Name: REDEV2- RPC URL: https://rpc2.redecoin.eu- Chain ID: 1972- Currency: REDEV2- Explorer: https://explorer3.redecoin.eu/**Token Swap:**For holders of the previous Rede project coins, we offer a token swap opportunity. You can exchange your old coins for the new REDEV2 coins at a rate of 400:1. Visit https://swap.redecoin.eu to complete the swap. The token swap will be available until January 1, 2024. After this date, the old coins will be burned.**Old Rede Coins:**All old Rede coins acquired from the previous project will be burned to maintain the integrity of the new REDEV2 ecosystem.**Pool Addresses:**Team Rede has set up pools for both old and new coins:- Old Rede coins pool: https://pool.redecoin.eu/- New REDEV2 coins pool: https://pool2.redecoin.eu/**Github**https://github.com/redecoinproject/redev2**community**discord https://discord.com/invite/MhBP2hEehUtelegram https://t.me/+rNRAiKzx-ydiYjhktwitter https://twitter.com/CoinRedeWe are committed to the success and growth of the REDEV2 project and will continue to provide updates and support for our community. Join us on our journey towards a vibrant and rewarding ecosystem.logo https://raw.githubusercontent.com/redecoinproject/redev2/master/redev2.pngThank you for your continued support and participation in the REDE project!Sincerely,The REDE Team

comments.author: jakub.artur
comments.body: New Pool for Mining RedeCoin v2 – PPLNS/SOLO!Dear Miners,We are excited to announce the launch of a new mining pool for RedeCoin v2! Start mining efficiently and comfortably with us.✅ Coin: RedeCoin v2 (REDEV2)  ✅ Mining Type: PPLNS / SOLO  ✅ Pool Address: https://pool2.redecoin.eu/Why choose our pool?  - Stable and reliable infrastructure.  - Fast payouts and low fees.  - Supports both SOLO and group (PPLNS) miners.  - Active community and technical support.Start mining now and join the growing RedeCoin v2 community! If you have questions or need assistance, feel free to visit our community channel or the FAQ section on our website.Join us and mine with confidence!  📍 Pool Address: https://pool2.redecoin.eu/  Happy mining! 🚀

comments.author: jakub.artur
comments.body: Stake Panel Update – Major Improvements to Node Sync & Network Growth!Dear RedeCoin Community,We’re excited to announce a massive update to the Stake Panel! This update brings powerful new features to improve node synchronization and enhance your experience. Let’s take a look at what's new!✨ What's New? ✨1. P2P & RPC Status – Real-Time Monitoring!     You can now easily view the status of your P2P and RPC connections. These are critical to ensuring your node is synchronized and communicating smoothly with the network!2. Minimum Coins Requirement – Stay in Control     The panel now shows you the exact minimum number of coins you need to run a fully functional node. Stay ahead of the curve with this real-time display!3. Node Sync Monitoring – Keep Your Node in Sync, Keep Earning!     Track your node’s sync status. Zombie nodes (out-of-sync nodes) will NOT receive rewards, so ensure your node stays synced for continuous payouts!4. Network Performance – Watch the Network Grow!     We are proud to announce a 1000% network growth! Check how the network is performing and monitor the benefits of this massive expansion by visiting our Network Dashboard.🙏 Thank You for Your Continued Support! 🙏Your amazing support allows us to grow and improve. Together, we are building something big. Let’s continue pushing the limits of what’s possible!Got Questions or Feedback? Don’t hesitate to post below – we’d love to hear from you and continue making RedeCoin better!
